text:
Hi, I'm Aleksandr.
 A middle frontend developer.
sub-text: Hello, my name is Aleksandr Chukhrai, and I'm a frontend developer. I have a passion for developing new things - big or small. I also love coding and mathematics. I was born in Kherson, Ukraine, and now I am {{text, age}}. I graduated from Kherson Technical State University with a degree of Bachelor of Science in Information Technology, where I discovered my passion for solving problems using information technology. I am currently working as a freelancer. If you want to get started with your project and need my help, feel free to contact me.
